title: Safely Managed Sanitation Services
description: In 2022, 100% of both rural and urban populations in Andorra used safely managed sanitation services, making it one of the best in the world.

title: Low Youth and Infant Mortality
description: In 2023, Andorra reported only 1 death each in the age groups 15-19, 20-24, and for infants, under-five, and neonatal, indicating one of the lowest mortality rates globally.
